summary: Feature request to implement special behavior for Temporal built-in prefixes in the Ruby SDK, aligning with cross-SDK standards defined in the features repository.
userImpact: Users will have consistent handling of built-in prefixes across all Temporal SDKs.
proposedFix: Implement special behavior for Temporal built-in prefixes as defined in temporalio/features#576
resolutionDetails: Feature implemented to align Ruby SDK with cross-SDK standards
